experiences.description: Paytm is the most popular fintech and trust app for payments, banking, and financial services in India. Currently, I am working with the wallet team to resolve spring and react challenges. I am gaining insight into how things operate on a larger scale. Currently, I am a novice at Spring boot, but the job is thrilling.

experiences.description: Flash Tech is a service based company majorly providing services to Western International Group, Dubai. I worked in INAAM app owned by Nesto Group International Dubai providing loyalty coupons, points and discounts for their shopping malls. I worked in React native stack and my major task was to optimize the app's multiple performance issue and flows. Here i learned about managing and deploying an app which have 100k+ users and 1 million+ customers. Learned about handling the pressure of deploying apps major flows overnight :) i swear this responsibility was huge for me but i passed with flying colors ;)
points: Managed and added various important features in INAAM app provided by Nesto Group International Dubai which provides coupons and discounts in their shopping malls.
Optimized the app’s multiple flows and was in charge of important design and functional modifications that improved the app’s engagement by 30% for 10 lakh+ customers and 1 lakh+ user.

experiences.description: National Blockchain Project was an initiative by indian government handled by IIT Kanpur developing blockchain based solutions for the government. I worked here as a full stack developer with my favourite MERN stack. I developed a lightning-fast web solution to assist blockchain developers in quickly deploying a production-ready Hyperledger Fabric network of distributed servers. It's similar to IBM blockchain platform but a small scale version made by me, a simple website to develop our own Hyperledger blockchain network with all the custom configuration and debugging support.
points: Engineered a scalable and lightning-fast web solution to assist blockchain developers in quickly deploying a production-ready Hyperledger Fabric network of distributed servers.
Shipped and delivered the project requirements by 40% faster
Optimized overall UI/UX to elevate engagement by 300%
Improved logging and debugging network logs using Blockchain Explorer.
